Container.Name: V-Rising
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install V Rising and run it.
**Save Files:** The save files are located in: .../vrising/save-data/Saves **Config Files:** The config files are located in: .../vrising/save-data/Settings
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container download at startup. If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '1829350 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Game Parameters
Config.Description: Enter additional game startup parameters if needed, otherwise leave empty.

Config.Name: UDP - Game Ports
Config.Description: UDP Game Ports (if you need other ports please delete this entry and create a new port mapping, also don't forget to change the ports in the config file which is located at .../vrising/save-data/Settings/ServerHostSettings.json).

Config.Name: BepInEx
Config.Description: If you want to enable BepInEx for V Rising set this variable to 'true' (without quotes). For more information please refer to this site: https://v-rising.thunderstore.io/package/BepInEx/BepInExPack_V_Rising/

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).
